post.body: lulz. Nice twitpic btw. I recognize that!

Plus I doubt I'll be twittering tomorrow. :p

Grats, man. That's a nice milestone. Here's to another 100!
I concur.
lol @ Top Gun. Sorry! :P
TC is a douche though. That sorta taints it for me. But will watch anyway eventually.
I enjoy WWII movies so I'll prob see it myself. But only on DVD and if they release outtakes of ghostly Hitler antics.
Aye :D

I'd take a stab at it, sure. (pun intended)
Haha. Alrighty. Nite!
